content: The new Telegram GROUP chat based project.It's "Coin Box" If you entry to Coin Box you can earn coins.It's Free to join it's fair system and you earn fair share How it works ? Coinbox where you need to add your cryptocurrency wallet aaddress and network so the other members can make donations and you make ammount of donations to them it's fun and benefical.In the text Box you are not allowed to talk or send any other things in the crypto Box only you can add your wallet aadress for donations Anyone who don't follow the rules will get instant ban.!!!You can send your cryptocurrency wallet for others for donation in every hour please make sure you add network info aswell for example If you want to receive random ammount of donation with USDT then you must add wich network you use it so others who make donations can use correct blockchain network option If they make donation to you.Everyday the Admin Will check few users to ask them to provide proof If they have done donations of any cryptocurrency to other wallets If not then admin will investigate you need to send at least into 3 different wallets in random ammounts of cryptocurrency.Admin will check over donation activity like bus or train ticket controller so to making sure everybody do their fair part in the system. Off course to make it even better and to get more cryptocurrency donations you can share the link with others.You need to give If you want to receive! Let's join link to join let's have fun: https://t.me/coinbox247Share your experince about Coin Box with others
